Clone the Repository
--------------------

You can fork the project from `<https://github.com/Abdelhz/da_python_p13_v2.git>`_ to your own github repository.

Create a new folder for the project:

.. code-block:: bash

   mkdir oc_lettings_project
   cd oc_lettings_project

Clone the project from your own github repository after forking it from `<https://github.com/Abdelhz/da_python_p13_v2.git>`_.

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone "Your own Github repository"

OR:

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/Abdelhz/da_python_p13_v2.git

Then you have to push this project to your own repository.
